mapper.select: select * from cart where goods_id=#{gid} and user_id=#{uid}
mapper.update: update cart set shoppingnum=shoppingnum+#{shoppingnum} where user_id=#{uid} and goods_id=#{gid}
mapper.select: select gt.gid, gt.gname, gt.gpicture, gt.gprice, ct.shoppingnum, ct.shoppingnum*gt.gprice smallsum from GOODS gt, CART ct where gt.gid=ct.goods_id and ct.user_id=#{id}
mapper.delete: delete from cart where user_id=#{uid} and goods_id=#{gid}
